 mgTLData sequence.

Detailed Description

mgTLDataVector is a vector of mgTLData which is a tessellated data of one face or surface.

If two (or more than two) faces share a binder edge, the faces are guaranteed to be tessallated from the same one straight line.

Member Function Documentation

void mgTLDataVector::compute_texture_coordinates ( const MGFSurface &  f,
const MGPosition &  uv,
const MGPosition &  st,
const MGUnit_vector &  texXaxis,
double  distortion_ratio = -1. 
)

compute all the texture coordinates of this m_tlpoints.

compute_texture_coordinates will find f in this vector, then compute texture coordinates of f. If f is a constituent face of a shell, all the textures of the faces of the shell will be computed.

Parameters:
f face or surface of uv.
uv surface parameter of the point st.
st texture coordinate of uv.
texXaxis world coordinate x axis vector.
distortion_ratio When >1. distorted points(points whose ratio are more than distortion_ratio or less than 1/distortion_ratio will be stored in m_tex_distorted.
void mgTLDataVector::compute_texture_coordinates ( const std::vector< MGFPoints > &  fpointsVec,
const MGFSurface &  f,
const MGPosition &  uv,
const MGPosition &  st,
const MGUnit_vector &  texXaxis,
double  distortion_ratio = -1. 
)

compute all the texture coordinates of this m_tlpoints.

compute_texture_coordinates will find f in this vector, then compute texture coordinates of f. If f is a constituent face of a shell, all the textures of the faces of the shell will be computed.

Parameters:
fpointsVec vector of vector of MGFPoint for high priority line. fpoints.size() must be >=1, and fpoints[0].size() must be >=1.
f face or surface of uv.
uv surface parameter of the point st.
st texture coordinate of uv.
texXaxis world coordinate x axis vector.
distortion_ratio When >1. distorted points(points whose ratio are more than distortion_ratio or less than 1/distortion_ratio will be stored in m_tex_distorted.
mgTLData* mgTLDataVector::find_tldata ( const MGFSurface *  face  ) 

Find mgTLData that is for the input face in this vector.

If found the pointer will be returned, else null will be returned.
